channel.title: How do i make a rune C' bow into my client?!
channel.description: hey how do i make it so i add my rune c'bow into my client Class8.Java and i save it then login to my server do ::pickup 00(Code for rune c'bow) then i get a rune dagger or somthing like that and not see the rune c'bow but when i right click it it, says Rune C' bow! Help me please! ~Mod Kay~

item.title: How do i make a rune C' bow into my client?!
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

  1. stop signing every post u say by saying ~Mod Kay~ thats what signatures are for
  2. post this in [i]client questions

Read full topic
